text: Today in Jelena watch, Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez did indeed spend New Year's Eve night watching fireworks together in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico People and E! are confirming. No kissing photos have been shared by the two or published by paparazzi, but the night's details have been divulged by multiple sources. Overall, a source told People, “ Justin and Selena are doing great. They celebrated New Year ’ s Eve together in Cabo.'' ( Gomez appeared in a friend's Instagram on the beach with her group ; Bieber shared a Snapchat of himself on New Year's night there ; and fans took video of Bieber on the beach in Cabo, too. ) Instagram Raquelle Stevens Snap
